message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go at this time. I'm happy to pay $12,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This reflects the value of the product while still being fair to both of us.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
